component.DashboardVideoPaneDownloadOpti.message: Autoriser le téléchargement de la vidéo

component.DashboardVideoPaneDownloadOpti.description: Failed to update download permission on your video.
component.DashboardVideoPaneDownloadOpti.message: Impossible de mettre à jour la vidéo. Merci de réessayer plus tard.

component.DashboardVideoPaneTranscriptOp.description: Failed to update download permission on your video.
component.DashboardVideoPaneTranscriptOp.message: Impossible de mettre à jour la vidéo. Merci de réessayer plus tard.

components.Dashboard.DashboardPaneButton.description: Dashboard button to display the existing document, if there is one.
Dashboard button to upload a document to replace the existing one, when there *is* an existing document.
Dashboard button to upload a document, when there is no existing document.
Dashboard button to play the existing video, if there is one.
Dashboard button to upload a video to replace the existing one, when there *is* an existing video.
Dashboard button to configure a live streaming
Dashboard button to upload a video, when there is no existing video.

components.Dashboard.title.description:
Title for the dashboard, where the user can see the status of the video/audio/timed text upload
      & processing, and will be able to manage them.

components.DashboardDocument.helptextErr.description: Dashboard helptext for when the document failed to upload or get processed.
components.DashboardDocument.helptextErr.message: Une erreur s'est produite avec ce document. Merci de réessayer ou de téléverser un autre document.

components.DashboardDocument.helptextPen.description: Dashboard helptext for the case when there is no existing document nor anything in progress.
components.DashboardDocument.helptextPen.message: Il n'y a pas encore de document à afficher.

components.DashboardDocument.helptextPro.description: Dashboard helptext to warn users document is processing.
components.DashboardDocument.helptextPro.message: Votre document est en cours de traitement. Cela peut prendre quelques minutes.

components.DashboardDocument.helptextRea.message: Votre document est prêt à être affiché.

components.DashboardDocument.helptextUpl.description: Dashboard helptext to warn user not to navigate away during document upload.
components.DashboardDocument.helptextUpl.message: Téléversement en cours... Merci de ne pas fermer ni recharger la page.

components.DashboardDocumentTitleForm.fo.description: Error message to warn the user that a title update failed and ask them to try again later.
components.DashboardDocumentTitleForm.fo.message: Impossible de mettre à jour le titre. Merci de réessayer plus tard.

components.DashboardDocumentTitleForm.fo.description: Label informing the user they can change the document title.
message display when the title is successfully updated

components.DashboardThumbnail.error.description: Generic error message when we fail to create a thumbnail.
components.DashboardThumbnail.error.message: Une erreur s'est produite durant la création de la vignette.

components.DashboardThumbnail.helptextPr.description: Thumbnail help text informing that the thumbnail is processing and will be available soon.
components.DashboardThumbnail.helptextPr.message: Votre vignette est en cours de traitement. Le traitement peut prendre quelques minutes. La vignette apparaîtra une fois le traitement terminé.

components.DashboardTimedTextPane.closed.description: Title for the closed captions management in the dashboard.

components.DashboardTimedTextPane.subtit.description: Title for the subtitles management in the dashboard.

components.DashboardTimedTextPane.transc.description: Title for the transcripts management in the dashboard.

components.DashboardVideoHarvested.publi.description: Call to action to publish a live video in VOD

components.DashboardVideoLive.liveStarti.description: Helptext explainig to wait until the live is ready.
components.DashboardVideoLive.liveStarti.message: La diffusion en direct démarre. Attendez avant de commencer votre stream.

components.DashboardVideoLive.liveStoppe.description: Helptext explaining that the live is ended and the live to VOD process has started.
components.DashboardVideoLive.liveStoppe.message: Le direct est terminé. Le processus de conversion du direct en VOD a débuté. Vous pouvez fermer cette fenêtre et revenir plus tard.

components.DashboardVideoLive.liveStoppi.description: Helptext explaining that the live is ending and the live to VOD process will start.
components.DashboardVideoLive.liveStoppi.message: Arrêt du direct. Le processus de conversion du direct en VOD va bientôt commencer. Vous pouvez fermer la fenêtre et revenir plus tard.

components.DashboardVideoLive.showLive.description: button to redirect use to video player.

components.DashboardVideoLive.streamLink.description: link to use to stream a video.

components.DashboardVideoPane.helpTextDe.description: Dashboard helptext for when the video is in DELETED state

components.DashboardVideoPane.helptextEr.description: Dashboard helptext for when the video failed to upload or get processed.
components.DashboardVideoPane.helptextEr.message: Une erreur s'est produite avec cette vidéo. Réessayez ou choisissez une autre vidéo.

components.DashboardVideoPane.helptextHa.description: Dashboard helptext to ask user to finish VOD conversion
components.DashboardVideoPane.helptextHa.message: La vidéo a été convertie en VOD. Vous devez explicitement publier la vidéo en cliquant sur le bouton ci-dessous.

components.DashboardVideoPane.helptextHa.description: Dashboard helptext to warn users not to wait for video processing in front of this page.
components.DashboardVideoPane.helptextHa.message: Votre vidéo est en cours de conversion en VOD. Le traitement peut prendre jusqu'à une heure. Vous pouvez fermer cette fenêtre et revenir plus tard.

components.DashboardVideoPane.helptextPe.description: Dashboard helptext for the case when there is no existing video nor anything in progress.
components.DashboardVideoPane.helptextPe.message: Il n'y a pas encore de vidéo à afficher.

components.DashboardVideoPane.helptextPr.description: Dashboard helptext to warn users not to wait for video processing in front of this page.
components.DashboardVideoPane.helptextPr.message: Votre vidéo est en cours de traitement. Le traitement peut prendre jusqu'à une heure. Vous pouvez fermer cette fenêtre et revenir plus tard.

components.DashboardVideoPane.helptextRe.message: Votre vidéo est prête à être visionnée.

components.DashboardVideoPane.helptextUp.description: Dashboard helptext to warn user not to navigate away during video upload.
components.DashboardVideoPane.helptextUp.message: Téléversement en cours... Merci de ne pas fermer ni recharger la page.

components.DashboardVideoPane.thumbnailA.description: Accessibility text for the video thumbnail in the Dashboard.
components.DashboardVideoPane.thumbnailA.message: Vignette de prévisualisation de la vidéo.

components.DashboardVideoPane.title.description: Subtitle for the video part of the dashboard (right now the only part until we add timed text tracks).

components.DashboardVideoPaneProgress.pr.description: Accessibility message for the upload progress bar.

components.ErrorComponent.liveIncompatib.description: Title when the object is incompatible with live mode
components.ErrorComponent.liveIncompatib.message: Mode live incompatible avec cet objet

components.ErrorComponent.lti.text.description: Helpful text for the LTI error page
components.ErrorComponent.lti.text.message: Nous ne pouvons vérifier vos droits pour accéder à cette vidéo. Merci de prendre contact avec votre instructeur. Si vous êtes l'instructeur, merci de vérifier vos paramètres.

components.ErrorComponent.lti.title.description: Title for the LTI error page
components.ErrorComponent.lti.title.message: Une erreur s'est produite pendant le chargement de la vidéo

components.ErrorComponent.notFound.text.description: Helpful text for the 404 Not Found error page
components.ErrorComponent.notFound.text.message: La vidéo n'existe pas ou n'a pas encore été publiée. Si vous êtes un instructeur assurez vous d'être correctement authentifié.

components.ErrorComponent.notFound.title.description: Title for the 404 Not Found error page

components.ErrorComponent.policy.text.description: Title for the upload permission error page
components.ErrorComponent.policy.text.message: Nous ne pouvons vérifier si vous avez les droits nécessaires pour téléverser un fichier. Vérifiez vos paramètres et/ou réessayez.

components.ErrorComponent.policy.title.description: Helpful text for the upload permission error page
components.ErrorComponent.policy.title.message: Impossible de vérifier vos droits pour téléverser le fichier

components.ErrorComponent.upload.text.description: Helpful text for the Upload error page
components.ErrorComponent.upload.text.message: Vous pouvez réessayer dans quelques instants. Vous devriez vérifier la qualité de votre connexion internet.

components.ErrorComponent.upload.title.description: Title for the video upload error page
components.ErrorComponent.upload.title.message: Erreur lors du téléversement du fichier vidéo

components.InstructorView.btnDashboard.description: Text for the button in the instructor view that allows the instructor to go to the dashboard.

components.InstructorView.disabledDashbo.description: Text explaining that the ivdeo is in read_only mode and the dashboard is not available
components.InstructorView.disabledDashbo.message: Cette vidéo est en lecture seule car elle appartient au cours : {lti_id}

components.InstructorView.maintenance.description: Text explaining that the dashboard is not accessible because marsha is in maintenance
components.InstructorView.maintenance.message: Le tableau de bord est en cours de maintenance, il ne peut pas être utilisé pour le moment.

components.InstructorView.title.description:
Title for the Instructor View. Describes the area appearing right above, which is a preview
      of what the student will see there.

components.ObjectStatusPicker.DELETED.description: Status information for a video/audio/timed text track

components.ObjectStatusPicker.ERROR.description: Status information for a video/audio/timed text track

components.ObjectStatusPicker.HARVESTED.description: Status information for a video/audio/timed text track
components.ObjectStatusPicker.HARVESTED.message: En attente de publication de la VOD

components.ObjectStatusPicker.HARVESTING.description: Status information for a video/audio/timed text track

components.ObjectStatusPicker.IDLE.description: The video is in live state and ready to be start

components.ObjectStatusPicker.PENDING.description: Status information for a video/audio/timed text track

components.ObjectStatusPicker.PROCESSING.description: Status information for a video/audio/timed text track

components.ObjectStatusPicker.READY.description: Status information for a video/audio/timed text track

components.ObjectStatusPicker.RUNNING.description: The video is in live state and live is running

components.ObjectStatusPicker.STARTING.description: The video is in live state and live is starting

components.ObjectStatusPicker.STOPPED.description: The video is in live state and has ended

components.ObjectStatusPicker.STOPPING.description: The video is in live state and is stopping

components.ObjectStatusPicker.UPLOADING.description: Status information for a video/audio/timed text track

components.SiteHeader.logInBtn.description: Text for the login button in the header of the marsha site

components.TimedTextCreationForm.addTrac.description: Text for the button in the dashboard to go upload a new timed text file.
Label for the form that lets the instructor add a new timed text track.

components.TimedTextCreationForm.error.description: Generic error message when we fail to create a subtitle/transcript/caption track.
components.TimedTextCreationForm.error.message: Une erreur s'est produite pendant la création de cette piste.

components.TimedTextListItem.delete.description: Link text to delete a subtitle/transcript/captions item.

components.TimedTextListItem.download.description: Link text to download a subtitle/transcript/captions item.

components.TimedTextListItem.replace.description: Link text to replace a subtitle/transcript/captions item with a new file (for the same language).

components.TimedTextListItem.upload.description: Link text to upload a missing subtitle/transcript/captions item file.

components.Transcripts.hideTranscript.description: Text to hide a displayed transcript

components.Transcripts.transcriptLabel.description: Text indicated to choose an available transcript language

components.Transcripts.transcriptSelect.description: Placeholder for the transcript select box

components.UploadForm.dropzoneButtonPick.description:
File upload dropzone: button to choose a file to upload,
      has the drag text next to it (components.UploadForm.dropzoneDragText)

components.UploadForm.dropzoneDragText.description:
File upload dropzone: helptext on the dropzone,
      goes along with the button (components.UploadForm.dropzoneButtonPick)

components.UploadForm.linkToDashboard.description: Text for the link to the dashboard in the upload form.

components.UploadForm.title-document.description: Title for the document upload form

components.UploadForm.title-thumbnail.description: Title for the thumbnail upload form

components.UploadForm.title-timedtexttra.description: Title for the timed text file upload form
components.UploadForm.title-timedtexttra.message: Téléverser un nouveau fichier de sous-titres codés (sourds et malentendants)

components.UploadForm.title-timedtexttra.description: Title for the timed text file upload form
components.UploadForm.title-timedtexttra.message: Téléverser un nouveau fichier de sous-titres

components.UploadForm.title-timedtexttra.description: Title for the timed text file upload form

components.UploadForm.title-videos.description: Title for the video upload form

plyr.controls.captions.menu.disabled.description: label used in the captions menu list to select the disabled option and then disable captions if selected

plyr.controls.captions.menu.enabled.description: label used in the captions menu list if captions are enabled and the selected caption has no language nor label

plyr.controls.currentTime.description: Indicates the current time in the video.

plyr.controls.enterFullscreen.description: Button to activate the fullscreen mode

plyr.controls.loop.description: Loop is commented in Plyr's code, it is a feature allowing users to play in loop a video section

plyr.controls.loop.all.description: When loop is activated, loop over all the video

plyr.controls.loop.end.description: When loop is activated, this the time where the loop should end at

plyr.controls.loop.reset.description: When loop is activated, button to reset the loop configuration

plyr.controls.loop.start.description: When loop is activated, this the time where the loop should start at

plyr.controls.progress.buffered.description: Used to indicate the % of buffered video

plyr.controls.progress.played.description: Used to indicate the % of video played

plyr.controls.quality.badge.1080.description: Label associatied to the 1080px quality badge

plyr.controls.quality.badge.1440.description: Label associatied to the 1440px quality badge

plyr.controls.quality.badge.2160.description: Label associatied to the 2160px quality badge

plyr.controls.quality.badge.480.description: Label associatied to the 480px quality badge

plyr.controls.quality.badge.576.description: Label associatied to the 576px quality badge

plyr.controls.quality.badge.720.description: Label associatied to the 720px quality badge

plyr.controls.rangeFill.seek.description: Video seek progress bar used as polyfill for webkit

plyr.controls.volume.description: Indicates the zone where the volume is managed in the plyr interface

plyr.pluging.ad.description: When Ad plugin is used, a countdown is display and this label is used to indicated the remaining time before viewing the video. Eg: Ad - 0:08

plyr.ui.frameTitle.description: Title set to an iframe when the video is loaded in an iframe as parent element

plyr.ui.menuBack.description: When a setting menu is open, this label is added to the button responsible to go back to the previous menu

plyr.ui.setting.quality.description: Label used in the menu to open quality setting

plyr.ui.setting.speed.description: Label used in the menu to open speed setting

plyr.ui.setting.speed.normal.description: Value used in the speed setting, corresponding to a 1x speed

plyr.ui.settings.description: Label used to indicate settings menu

plyr.ui.settings.captions.description: Label used in the setting menu to access captions choices
